description: Gets the specified recommendation run that was used to generate rules.

parameters.name: RunId
parameters.description: The unique run identifier associated with this run.

nested_items.name: RunId
nested_items.description: The unique run identifier associated with this run.

nested_items.name: DataSource
nested_items.description: The data source (an Glue table) associated with this run.

nested_items.name: GlueTable
nested_items.description: An Glue table.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: A database name in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: A table name in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: ConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection to the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: AdditionalOptions
nested_items.description: Additional options for the table. Currently there are two keys supported:
pushDownPredicate: to filter on partitions without having to list and read all the files in your dataset.
catalogPartitionPredicate: to use server-side partition pruning using partition indexes in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: Role
nested_items.description: An IAM role supplied to encrypt the results of the run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfWorkers
nested_items.description: The number of G.1X workers to be used in the run. The default is 5.

nested_items.name: Timeout
nested_items.description: The timeout for a run in minutes. This is the maximum time that a run can consume resources before it is terminated and enters TIMEOUT status. The default is 2,880 minutes (48 hours).

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status for this run.

nested_items.name: ErrorString
nested_items.description: The error strings that are associated with the run.

nested_items.name: StartedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time when this run started.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedOn
nested_items.description: A timestamp. The last point in time when this data quality rule recommendation run was modified.

nested_items.name: CompletedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time when this run was completed.

nested_items.name: ExecutionTime
nested_items.description: The amount of time (in seconds) that the run consumed resources.

nested_items.name: RecommendedRuleset
nested_items.description: When a start rule recommendation run completes, it creates a recommended ruleset (a set of rules). This member has those rules in Data Quality Definition Language (DQDL) format.

nested_items.name: CreatedRulesetName
nested_items.description: The name of the ruleset that was created by the run.

nested_items.name: DataQualitySecurityConfiguration
nested_items.description: The name of the security configuration created with the data quality encryption option.
